name: Beatroots (jakeberry, Rinade)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It's time to drop the beet!

Hit the arrows in time to make some juicy beets and make the crowd root for you!

Watch out for arrows AND letters in this fresh take on the rhythm genre.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TEAM

Gwyneth Esteban - Art https://gwynethe.artstation.com/

Morgan Ridley-Smith - Music https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRitjV5ek75a1e2qzZhkYZQ

Trinity Ridley-Smith - Programming rinade.itch.io

Jake Berry - Programming jakeberry.itch.io
